text: aur jo log kaaphir hon baithe kahate hain ki ham to na is quraan par haragiz eemaan laenge aur na us (kitaab) par jo isase pahale naazil ho chukee aur (ai rasool tumako bahut taajjub ho) agar tum dekho ki jab ye zaalim qayaamat ke din apane paravaradigaar ke saamane khade kie jaayenge (aur) unamen ka ek doosare kee taraph (apanee) baat ko pherata hoga ki kamazor adana (daraje ke) log bade (sarakash) logon se kahate hogen ki agar tum (hamen) na (bahakae) hote to ham zaroor eemaanavaale hote (is museebat mein na padate)
